This is the place to keep track of what is happening in the Glasgow Archery League, organised by Iain McMillan and West of Scotland Archery Association.

See the Events tab for the scores for events that have taken place so far. The next event will be hosted by Monklands Archery at The Time Capsule on Sunday 24th November, 1200-1700.
